title: Where is SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.SKCanvasView?
body:
### Description

There are no CanvasViews in SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS as opposed to SkiaSharp.Views.iOS/tvOS/Mac.

### Code

`SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS. //See intellisense`

### Expected Behavior

Some helper view will be present in SkiaSharp.watchOS.

### Actual Behavior

No helper views nor controllers are there.

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio for Mac
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - watchOS:  default when creating project
- Target Devices:
  -   Apple Watch
